answers.answer: My son is 18 his problem started two years ago, he thinks there is nothing wrong he struggles to eat in front of people an would take panic attacks, he would go all day with out eating may be a banana, then would eat a meal but all foods have to be the same he says some foods are dirty, his weight has went up at his lowest he was just below 7 stone he is still thin.

question: I was diagnosed at age 41 .....put on insulin 6 months later...4 months ago I was removed from insulin...now I only take oral meds. I have lost 10 pounds since being taken off insulin. I need to gain back the weight (I only weigh 125 and should weigh more). How do I gain weight? I don't want to sacrifice good numbers or a decent HB a1c.
title: weight control with diabetes
